[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@datadog/browser-logs](./browser-logs.md) &gt; [LogsInitConfiguration](./browser-logs.logsinitconfiguration.md) &gt; [forwardReports](./browser-logs.logsinitconfiguration.forwardreports.md)

## LogsInitConfiguration.forwardReports property

Forward reports from the \[Reporting API\](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Reporting\_API) to Datadog. Use "all" to forward everything or an array of report types to forward only a subset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
forwardReports?: RawReportType[] | 'all' | undefined;
```
